short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Download images and add them to an RSS feed.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Right click an image to download it and add it to an RSS feed. Destination folder is configurable. An RSS feed of images snapped is created in the destination folder. You can optionally install a simple index.html feed viewer into the destination folder. Upload the destination folder to a server to make it web accessible.
